about.description: vtki is a VTK helper module that takes a different approach on interfacing with VTK through NumPy and direct array access. This module simplifies mesh creation and plotting by adding functionality to existing VTK objects. This module can be used for scientific plotting for presentations and research papers as well as a supporting module for other mesh dependent Python modules.
about.summary: A Streamlined Python Interface for the Visualization Toolkit

about.description: vtki is a VTK helper module that takes a different approach on interfacing with VTK through NumPy and direct array access. This module simplifies mesh creation and plotting by adding functionality to existing VTK objects. This module can be used for scientific plotting for presentations and research papers as well as a supporting module for other mesh dependent Python modules.
about.summary: A Streamlined Python Interface for the Visualization Toolkit

name: vtki
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "vtki" %}
{% set version = "0.18.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: aa61a8ad05d885090085c290d9d466ea9953dd8f5767b27013f77cbd14e065ff

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - numpy
    - imageio
    - appdirs
    - vtk <=8.1.2
  run:
    - python
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - imageio
    - appdirs
    - vtk <=8.1.2

test:
  imports:
    - vtki

about:
  home: https://github.com/vtkiorg/vtki
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Streamlined Python Interface for the Visualization Toolkit'

  description: |
    vtki is a VTK helper module that takes a different approach on interfacing with VTK through NumPy and direct array access. This module simplifies mesh creation and plotting by adding functionality to existing VTK objects. This module can be used for scientific plotting for presentations and research papers as well as a supporting module for other mesh dependent Python modules.
  doc_url: http://docs.vtki.org/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/vtkiorg/vtki

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - banesullivan
    - hadim
